li.p: tax law determines which deductions are offset against taxable income in determining taxable profits. The Board also noted that paragraph 5 of IAS 12 defines taxable profit as the profit of a period, determined in accordance with the rules established by the taxation authorities, upon which income taxes are payable.
no deferred tax asset is recognised if the reversal of the deductible temporary difference will not lead to tax deductions.
